name: MEMessageAction.MessageColor
desc: A color that the system uses to display a message in the message list.

items.name: case green
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to green.

items.name: case yellow
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to yellow.

items.name: case orange
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to orange.

items.name: case red
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to red.

items.name: case purple
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to purple.

items.name: case blue
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to blue.

items.name: case gray
items.desc: Sets the color of the message to gray.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Clears the color of the message.
